name: Hope
description:
"These days can get so dark
Like an eclipse in the sky
But I can rise above
I can find the light"

Those are some of the lyrics from the band We Came as Romans - Hope.

I love everything about that song, the music, the positive message of every lyric, I hope you also feel what the song is trying to convey.

And I made this illustration inspired by that song.

let that hope always be within us.

Are you in or you out?
